TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that has been studied as a treatment for cancer and as a treatment for cachexia (body wasting) associated with advanced cancer.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "sulfato de hidracina"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia que se ha estudiado para tratar el cáncer y la caquexia (deterioro progresivo del cuerpo) relacionado con el cáncer avanzado.
